>
[Ghost Touch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 584 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a melee weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The weapon can harm creatures without physical form. A _ghost touch_ weapon is particularly effective against [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures, which almost always have a specific vulnerability to _ghost touch_ weapons. Incorporeal creatures can touch, hold, and wield _ghost touch_ weapons (unlike most physical objects).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
